target_name: Promote the rule of law at the national and international levels and ensure equal access to justice for all
computation_definitions:
Data unavailable (Type4)
There are currently no national statistics (Type 1), international statistics (Type 2), or alternative national statistics (Type 3) available. The Data of Type 1, type 2, or type 3 can be also included in case of temporary unavailability.
global_indicator_name: Proportion of the population who have experienced a dispute in the past two years and who accessed a formal or informal dispute resolution mechanism, by type of mechanism
indicator_definition: A dispute can be understood as a justiciable problem between individuals or between individual(s) and an entity.
un_custodian_agency: United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (United Nations Office for Disarmament Affairs (UNODC))
title: Untitled
source_organisation_1: United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (United Nations Office for Disarmament Affairs (UNODC))
